messages.subject: re-intro
messages.msgSnippet: Hi. I have been no mail for several months since I moved to Austin, TX.  I recently switched to Daily Digest to ease back into my groups and I found many of
messages.messageBody:
Hi. I have been no mail for several months since I moved to Austin,
TX. I recently switched to Daily Digest to ease back into my groups
and I found many of your posts too interesting too miss out on! So
I'm back. I probably wasn't too involved before because I'm a bit of
a group junkie and often found myself overwhelmed with emails. ;)

Anyway......my name is Angela and I have 2 girls (4.25 yrs & 22
months) and I'm expecting #3 in early March. I am enjoying
unschooling my girls even at this young age. I finally started to
get it when my oldest dd didn't show any interest in learning her
numbers until she wanted to know what time it was! She also taught
herself to swim this summer (creating her own unique stroke, of
course). I love observing their little minds at work.

Nice to be back-
Angela McGinn
